word: But the Baptist did not surrender his faith in Christ. . . . He determined to send a message of inquiry to Jesus. This he entrusted to two of his disciples. . . . The disciples came to Jesus with their message, "Art thou he that should come, or do we look for another?" . . . The Saviour did not at once answer the disciples' question. As they stood wondering at His silence, the sick and afflicted were coming to Him to be healed. . . . While He healed their diseases, He taught the people. . . .
